page.title: 15The Church Page 2
page.content: school,they are James Trusler and James Lowman. By a chancel window is an ancient wall painting of a bishop.He is raising his hand in blessing. Behind it is a beutiful bit of wood panaling,this is to comemorate Philip Cunningham Rector from 1928_1939. Between the two churches is the ambr'e.This is a little cupboard with a curtain drawn over it.Above is the sanctury light,this a low wattage light which tells people to be espesially reverand in this part of the church.In the chancel of the new church are the choir stalls.By the organ is a plaque to comemorate Dennis Lee a former church organist. On two pughs in the west end of the church are two poles.On top of one is a crown and on the other is a bishops hat.
